title: Top selling Nintendo Wii games worldwide in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
The Sales in million units is appeared to be the highest at Month Wii Sports and lowest at Month Wii Party.
The highest Month Wii Sports has 73.54 more Sales in million units than the lowest Month Wii Party.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
Month Wii Sports has the highest Sales in million units and Wii Party has the lowest Sales in million units.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales in million units in the y axis.
The Sales in million units is appeared to be the highest at Month Wii Sports and lowest at Month Wii Party.
The highest Month Wii Sports has 73.54 more Sales in million units than the lowest Month Wii Party.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Sales in million units in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Sales in million units 82.88 is found at Month Wii Sports and the minimum is found at Wii Party where Month is 9.34.
Second maximum Sales in million units is found at Month Mario Kart Wii.
There is a difference of 73.54 between the maximum Month Wii Sports and minimum Month Wii Party.
Month Wii Sports is higher than any other Months with value 82.88, followed by Mario Kart Wii, and Wii Sports Resort. Down to Month Wii Party with the lowest value 9.34.
Over the past 10 Months, the Sales in million units has declined.
The Month Wii Sports has 2.85 times more Sales in million units than average.
The Sales in million units is 290.76 if we add up values of all Months.
